comments:
Using I20070516-1800, when I scrolled inside the variable view, I ended up with some empty rows.
Selecting another frame and coming back to the same frame fixes it.
Look at the attached screenshot.
Are there steps to reproduce? Anything in the .log?

Unfortunately now.
It looks like this is a timing issue when scrolling the variable tree.
I got some exception about being disconnected from the VM in my .log file, but I don't believe this is related.

com.sun.jdi.VMDisconnectedException: Got IOException from Virtual Machine

I easily get it if I scroll fast in the variable view.
If you wait, do the values every appear? Which class can I use as an example? (i.e. which class is in the screen shot?)

It I wait, nothing gets added.
The rows remain empty till I force a refresh of the view by selecting another thread.
The code shown in the screenshot is not available yet in CVS. I am working on it. It is far from being ready publicly. If you want I can send you a patch.

Have you seen this bug again?  If you can reproduce it, can you send us the patch or point us in the right direction?

There are several bugs similar to this.  I'm trying to determine which are duplicates.
Marking as works for me. Please re-open if problem persists.
